hit-animations.name: Show hit or miss animations
hit-animations.hint: Requires Sequencer and JB2A animations! Enable or disable hit or miss animations. Disable if you do not have the JB2A patreon module or Sequencer loaded!

jb2a-patreon.name: Use JB2A Patreon assets
jb2a-patreon.hint: Enable if you do have the JB2A patreon module. Disable if you do not.

hit-sounds.name: Play sounds on hit
hit-sounds.hint: Requires Sequencer! Play sounds when target is hit by a ranged attack

sound-select.name: Select hit sounds
sound-select.hint: Select the sounds you want to be played when a token lands a hit on another

dv-display-show.name: Show DV Display on token hover
dv-display-show.hint: Shows the DV of all equipped ranged weapons when hovering over another token. Have the token selected you want as source and hover over the token you want to hit

dv-display-combat-only.name: Show DV Display only during combat
dv-display-combat-only.hint: The DV Display is only shown on hover if there is current an active combat encounter

dv-display-position.name: Position of the DV Display at the token
dv-display-position.hint: Sets the position where the DV Display should be shown right next to the hovered token

dv-display-show-weapon-name.name: Show weapon names in the DV Display
dv-display-show-weapon-name.hint: The DV Display uses the weapon names when setting is enabled. It will use the weapon types when disabled

cover-token-hide-on-place.name: Hide cover token on place
cover-token-hide-on-place.hint: Hides the the cover token when created through the macro. GMs will be able to see it, but players will not.

poor-weapon-check.name: Check if poor quality weapons should jam
poor-weapon-check.hint: Checks each attack roll if a poor quality weapon should jam or break. Do mind that quality of weapons is noted in their weapon name such as (Poor)! This is important for this to work!

dfAmbientLights-enable.name: Create Lights for muzzle flashes
dfAmbientLights-enable.hint: Requires the modules "DF Active Lights" and "Automated Animations". When Automated Animation plays a ranged attack animation it will simulate a muzzle flash by placing an ambient light source. It will clean the light up on its own.

itemPilesHandling.name: Item Pile Integration
itemPilesHandling.hint: Enables special handling for upgraded items while using item piles. Automatically handles the upgrade items, removes or adds them. There is a delay in upgrade removal, be patient.

missed.evade: {attacker} missed {target} by {dv-diff+1} according to the ranged DV ({dv})! Roll damage IF they have declared that they are dodging AND your roll has beat their evasion roll!

hit.evade: {attacker} beats the ranged DV ({dv}, {dv-diff} over) to hit {target} by {dv-diff-1}! Roll damage IF they have NOT declared that they are dodging OR your roll has beat their evasion roll

dialog.title: Create cover token
dialog.description: Create a cover token with its HP based on its material. Select from a set preset drop down or mix and match how you need it. Height and Width values are in grid size values!

cover.only-gm: This function is only usable by a GM!
cover.created-actor: Created default actor for cover tokens: "{actor-name}"
cover.zero-hp-no-cover: Anything with 0 HP is not considered cover, it might be used as concealment!

poor-weapon-check.jam-weapon: Upon attacking with the weapon "{weapon}",it jams!
poor-weapon-check.break-weapon: Upon attacking with the weapon "{weapon}", it breaks, and is not usable anymore!
poor-weapon-check.break-beyond-weapon: Upon attacking with the weapon "{weapon}", it breaks beyond repair, and is not usable anymore!
poor-weapon-check.cointoss: Upon attacking with the weapon "{weapon}", a malfunction happens. A coin must be tossed to determine what happens! Check the rules of the weapon for details!
